title.rendered: India vs New Zealand, 2nd ODI, 2023: Fantasy Team, Probable Playing XIs, Pitch Report, & Fantasy Tips for the Match

content.rendered:
Fantasy Team for India vs New Zealand, 2nd ODI

We have opted for a fantasy cricket team based on the recent performances, overall impact, and credit points.

Probable Playing XIs for India & New Zealand

India: Rohit Sharma (c), Shubman Gill, Virat Kohli, Ishan Kishan (wk), Suryakumar Yadav, Hardik Pandya, Washington Sundar, Shardul Thakur/Umran Malik, Kuldeep Yadav, Mohammed Shami, Mohammed Siraj

New Zealand: Finn Allen, Devon Conway, Henry Nicholls, Daryl Mitchell, Tom Latham (c & wk), Glenn Phillips, Michael Bracewell, Mitchell Santner, Henry Shipley, Lockie Ferguson, Blair Tickner

Venue: Shaheed Veer Narayan Singh International Stadium, Raipur

Pitch Report for the Match

This will be the first ODI at the venue. As per the reports, the pitch is expected to favour the batters. Another high-scoring game could be on the cards.

Also Read:

Zimbabwe vs Ireland, 2nd ODI, 2023: Fantasy Tips

Pros and Cons of Creating Multiple Fantasy Cricket Teams

Fantasy Tips of The Day

For 9 straight ODIs, Mohammed Siraj has been a part of the Ultimate Team. In this period, he has bagged 24 wickets, including 2 four-fers and 3 three-fers.

Similarly, Kuldeep Yadav hasn’t gone wicketless for 9 ODIs in a row. Against New Zealand, he has taken 15 wickets, including the best figures of 4 for 39 in 7 games.

Virat Kohli might have flopped in the previous game, but he has a staggering record against New Zealand. He has accumulated 1,386 runs at 58, including 5 hundreds and 8 fifties.

Although Henry Nicholls could add only 18 in the opening ODI, his numbers against India are encouraging. In 13 innings, he has collected 412 runs at 38, including the highest score 80.

Barring Rohit Sharma, every other Indian top-order batter has registered at least once century in the last 4 ODIs. In other words, between Shubman Gill, Kohli and Ishan Kishan, two double-tons and two hundreds have been slammed.

Given the batting friendly conditions at Raipur and the prowess of both sides, the batters are likely to generate maximum fantasy points.

Play fantasy cricket on My11Circle Now!
